articles.title: Greetings to Singaporean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Singaporean President
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Singaporean President S. R. Nathan on the occasion of its 44th national day.
					Kim Yong Nam expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop and sincerely wished the Singaporean President and people greater successes in their work for the progress and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Korean Young Wrestlers Prove Successful
articles.content:
Korean Young Wrestlers Prove Successful
Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Korean wrestlers proved successful in the 2009 Asian Junior Wrestling Championships held in India from July 31 to August 2.
					 The championships brought together more than 200 wrestlers from 22 countries and regions.
					
					 The Korean wrestlers bagged a gold medal, a silver medal and two bronze medals.
					
					 Ri Kwang Hyok came first in the male Greco-roman 42kg class.
					
					 Ri Su Ok placed second in the female freestyle 46kg class and Choe Song Il and Kim Jin Hyok third in the male freestyle 46kg and 50kg classes.

articles.title: Highly-Effective Insulators and Paints
articles.content:
Highly-Effective Insulators and Paints
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Products of the Anju Insulator Factory under the Korea General Machinery Trading Corporation are popular among users.
					 In particular, the high-tension varnish, insulation varnish and other insulating materials for electric motor and transformer are economically effective more than previous ones.
					
					 The electrical insulation glass cloth and electrical insulation cloth also extend the serviceable life of electrical machinery and appliances remarkably.
					
					 Various paints including enamel and lacquer produced at the factory have desirable technical properties so that they are widely used for painting metal and wooden products and ship-hull.
					
					 These goods were put on display at the 12th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair to attract interest of visitors.

articles.title: Sohung Lake in Mountains
articles.content:
Sohung Lake in Mountains
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The Sohung Lake is called a "sea" in mountains in DPRK.
					 The man-made lake completed in July of Juche 50 (1961) is surrounded by Sohung, Pongsan, Unpha and Rinsan counties in North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 Its catchment area covers more than 700 square kilometers, where oak, chestnut, Populus Maximowiczii, linden and other trees grow densely, making good watershed protection conditions.
					
					 Its main source of water is atmospheric precipitation and the Sohung River and its ten or more tributary streams flow into the lake.
					
					 The lake is the main source of water of the irrigation system in the Lake Sohung area. Its water irrigates tens of thousands of hectares of farmland in Sariwon, Pongsan, Yonthan, Unpha, Songrim and Hwangju along a 1 400km-long waterway.
					
					 There are rest centers and children's camp in scenic spots around the lake.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung named it Lake Sohung.

articles.title: Lee Group's "Policy towards North" Bound to Go Bust
articles.content:
Lee Group's "Policy towards North" Bound to Go Bust 
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The "policy toward the north" pursued by the south Korean authorities is meeting bitterer rebuff and denunciation with each passing day. This means the bankruptcy of their policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen as it is characterized by treachery and anti-reunification acts.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The puppet ruling authorities' policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen is bound to go bust for its injustice. 
					
					 The above-said policy diametrically runs counter to national independence, the core issue in achieving the reunification of the country and settling the issues of the nation. 
					
					 How to approach the issue of national independence is a touchstone to distinguish a patriot from a traitor in the struggle for the country's reunification decisive of the destiny of the Koreans. 
					
					  No sooner had the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors come to power than he totally denied national independence, challenging the desire of the Koreans to solve the issue of national reunification by themselves and powerfully demonstrate their spirit of independence. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities' "policy toward the north" also diametrically runs counter to the development of the inter-Korean relations and the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					 Had the Lee group not adopted the policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen, the inter-Korean relations would not have reached such catastrophic phase where there is neither dialogue nor cooperation as now and more signal successes would have been made in the movement for national reunification.
					
					 Their policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen is seriously jeopardizing the security of the compatriots and peace on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The south Korean conservative ruling forces are now defaming the north-south joint declarations reflecting the Koreans' desire for peaceful reunification as "enemy-benefiting documents." Not content with this, they are crying out for declaring them "invalid" in a bid to frantically step up the moves to invade the north. 
					
					  The history has proven more than once that only miserable self-destruction awaits those traitors hell-bent on confrontation with fellow countrymen, backed by foreign forces.

articles.title: Struggle against Imperialists' False Propaganda Campaign Called for
articles.content:
Struggle against Imperialists' False Propaganda Campaign Called for
Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- It presents itself as an important task at present  to foil the false propaganda campaign of the imperialists as they are persistently pursuing their policy of domination and hegemony by relying on the old and unfair international information order in the international arena. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The false propaganda of the imperialists is very crafty and mean in its methods as it is based on ultramodern science and technique. That is why it is necessary to counter the reactionary information offensive of the imperialists with a revolutionary information offensive.
					
					 The more frantic the imperialists get in their reactionary information offensive, the more dynamic information service based on justice the progressive countries should conduct to cope with it, while maintaining a high degree of working class awareness and transparent anti-imperialist spirit.
					
					 The United Nations should conduct information activities on the principle of respect for the sovereignty of its all members, equality and non-interference in their internal affairs and fully ensure objectivity and impartiality in these activities.
					
					 It is important to increase the role of the non-aligned information service. 
					
					 Now that the worldwide information network is rapidly gaining in scope and strength through the rapid introduction of internet it is necessary to pay a great attention to strictly guarding against and checking the infiltration of undesirable misinformation spread by the imperialists through internet. 
					
					 It is quite possible to frustrate the reactionary propaganda offensive of the imperialists if it is strongly countered with high vigilance. 
					
					 The progressive people of the world should turn out as one in the struggle to resolutely foil the false propaganda campaign of the imperialists, establish a new and fair international information order and build a new world, independent and  peaceful.

articles.title: U.S. Projected Deployment of F-15Es in S. Korea Blasted
articles.content:
U.S. Projected Deployment of F-15Es in S. Korea Blasted
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists are contemplating deploying 12 F-15Es in the U.S. air force base in Kunsan, North Jolla Province on August 20 under the pretext of rotation deployment, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 These fighters belong to Squadron of Expedition Fighters No. 389 and are expected to fly from an air force base in Idaho, U.S. It is said that more than 400 personnel will be deployed for their operation. 
					
					 Disclosing this fact, the commander of the U.S. Seventh Air Force in south Korea blustered that F-15Es would not only "provide deterrence" but spend a lot of time conducting flight training with the puppet air force during their deployment in Kunsan.
					
					 The U.S. warmongers are massively introducing war hardware for preemptive attack, timed to coincide with the DPRK-targeted large-scale joint military exercises.

articles.title: Fascist Police's Murder of Workers Slammed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Fascist Police's Murder of Workers Slammed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Workers of Ssangyong Motor Co. released an appeal on August 6 condemning the Lee Myung Bak group for its brutal murder of workers. 
					 We have staged actions urgently demanding the guarantee of the right to existence for more than 80 days but the authorities hurled police force into our worksite to indiscriminately suppress our actions, they noted, adding the murder of workers will go on under the Lee regime.
					
					 They called upon all the people to turn out as one in the struggle against the savage murder committed by police.

articles.title: Cancellation of Plan for U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Exercises Demanded
articles.content:
Cancellation of Plan for U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Exercises Demanded
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Monday in demand of the immediate cancellation of the plan of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to stage the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					 Recalling that the south Korea-U.S. Combined Forces Command announced it would stage the joint military exercises from August 17 to 27, the statement noted the danger of the exercises lies in that the newly worked plan for joint operations would be applied instead of the existing OPLAN 5027. 
					
					 The projected joint maneuvers aimed at the invasion of the north either in their contents or scale reveal a sinister design for aggression hidden behind the signboard of "preserving peace" and "dialogue" touted by the U.S. and south Korea, it said.
					
					 The statement branded the projected joint military exercises as a new provocation to the DPRK and an act of threatening world peace and strongly demanded the U.S. and south Korea cancel the plan at once.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Patriotic Forces Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Patriotic Forces Assailed
Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain issued a joint statement on July 27 strongly denouncing the south Korean authorities for their brutal suppression of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and other patriotic people.
					 It held that it is a sycophantic and treacherous act to suppress the forces struggling for the country's reunification.
					
					 It stressed that the organizations demand the south Korean authorities release the detained personages, halt at once the suppression of the pro-reunification patriotic forces and repeal the "National Security Law", an anti-reunification law.
					
					 The statement expressed full support to the patriotic people in their struggle for the democratization of the south Korean society and reunification of the country.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The Ukrainian Independence Federation issued a statement on July 23 in support of the just cause of the Korean people.
					 It noted that the federation expresses firm solidarity with the heroic Korean people fighting against the U.S. imperialists under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It said that the federation sends full support to the measures taken by the DPRK to cope with the ever-more undisguised U.S. hostile policy towards it and the Korean people's will to build a strong and independent socialist power.
					
					 Expressing belief that the DPRK will attain its goal and emerge one of the world powers in the field of space development, it supported the DPRK in its policy of nuclear deterrence to cope with the anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. imperialists and Japan and south Korea, their followers.
					
					 The Korean people's struggle for independence serves as an example for the members of the federation, it added.

articles.title: Luchadores coreanos sobresalen en campeonato asiatico de juniors
articles.content:
Luchadores coreanos sobresalen en campeonato asiatico de juniores
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ATCC) -- Los luchadores coreanos lograron buenos resultados en el Campeonato Asiatico de Lucha de Juniores de 2009 que transcurrio del 31 de julio al 2 de agosto en la India con la presencia de mas de 200 jugadores de 22 paises y regiones.
					Ri Kwang Hyok ocupo el primer lugar en la division de 42 kg (m) del estilo grecorromano y Ri Su Ok termino en el segundo lugar en la categoria de 46 kg (f) de lucha libre.
					
					Mientras tanto, los muchachos Choe Song Il y Kim Jin Hyok se situaron en el tercer lugar en sus respectivos pesos de 46 kg y 50 kg de lucha libre. 
					
					De esta manera, los luchadores coreanos conquistaron una medalla de oro, igual numero de plata y dos de bronce.

articles.title: Entidades britanicas condenan represion a patriotas surcoreanos
articles.content:
Entidades britanicas condenan represion a patriotas surcoreanos
 Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ATCC) -- La Asociacion de Estudio de la Politica de Songun de Gran Bretana, el Grupo de Estudio de la Idea Juche de Gran Bretana y la sucursal britanica de la Asociacion de Amistad con Corea, con su sede en Espana, publicaron el 27 de julio una declaracion conjunta condenando la brutal represion de las autoridades surcoreanas a la Direccion Surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) y a las personalidades patrioticas.
					 Reprimir a las fuerzas, que luchan por la reunificacion del pais, es una accion vendepatria y servil a las grandes potencias, comienza la nota.
					
					 Exige a las autoridades surcoreanas que liberen a las personalidades detenidas, cesen de inmediato la represion a las fuerzas patrioticas partidarias de la reunificacion y cancelen la infame "ley de seguridad" en contra de la reunificacion.
					
					    Finalmente, expresa el apoyo absoluto a las figuras patrioticas quienes luchan por la democratizacion de la sociedad surcoreana y la reunificacion del pais.

articles.title: EE.UU. planea ubicar cazas "F-15E" en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
EE.UU. planea ubicar cazas "F-15E" en el Sur de Corea
  Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ATCC) -- Segun "Yonhap News" del Sur de Corea, los imperialistas norteamericanos tratan de desplegar el dia 20 los 12 cazas "F-15E" en su base aerea en Kunsan de la provincia de Jolla del Norte por concepto de la ubicacion rotativa.
					  Estos aviones pertenecientes al batallon de aviacion expedicionaria No. 389 provendran de su base aerea en el Estado de Idaho de EE.UU.
					
					  Llegaran junto con ellos mas de 400 hombres auxiliares.
					
					  Al referirse al tema, el comandante de la Septima Fuerza Aerea Norteamericana ocupante del Sur de Corea dijo que durante la estancia de esos cazas en Kunsan, "se ofrecerian las fuerzas disuasorias" y se realizarian muchos ejercicios aereos con la aviacion titere surcoreana.
					
					  Los belicistas norteamericanos emplazan en el Sur de Corea una gran cantidad de medios belicos, considerados aptos para el ataque preventivo, en visperas de los macro-ejercicios militares conjuntos para la agresion al Norte de Corea.

articles.title: En Checo demandan revocar plan de ejercicio militar EE.UU-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
En Checo demandan revocar plan de ejercicio militar EE.UU-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ATCC) -- La Asociacion de Amistad Checo-Corea Paektusan y el Grupo de Estudio y Materializacion de la Idea Juche de Checo hicieron publica el dia 3 una declaracion conjunta en demanda de la revocacion inmediata del plan de ejercicios militares conjuntos Estados Unidos - Sur de Corea "Ulji Freedom Guardian".
					La "comandancia de las fuerzas combinadas" surcoreano-norteamericanas anuncio publicamente que desarrollaria del dia 17 al 27 esa maniobra militar, cuya peligrosidad reside en que se aplicara en esta ocasion el nuevo plan de operacion conjunta trazado en lugar del existente "plan operacional 5027", senala la nota. 
					
					Este plan supone la agresion al Norte de Corea tanto en su contenido como en su dimension y muestra la intencion agresiva de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea detras de las palabras como la "preservacion de la paz" y el "dialogo", de que hablan tanto ellos, asevera.
					
					Califica tal simulacro de nueva provocacion contra la RPDC y de amenaza a la paz mundial y demanda fuertemente la cancelacion pronta del controvertido plan.
